public class GameService
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameService(GameRepository gameRepository)
      This constructor grabs the repository for access to the database

      check is the method to apply a users check action to the gamestate in question

      fold allows the user to fold, surrendering the hand in question

      • GameService

        public GameService(GameRepository gameRepository)
        This constructor grabs the repository for access to the database
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • getGameState

        public GameStateTransport getGameState(long id)
        This gets a gamestate transport object for the client when they first join or need it, requiring only the id
        Parameters:
        id - is the representative of the gamestate in the database
        Returns:
        the object for communication to the frontend

      • handleAction

        public GameUpdateTransport handleAction(long id,
                                        GameAction action,
                                        long userID)
        This method takes the message from the Controller when an action is received, it takes that action, interprets it, gets the gamestate and calls appropriate methods. It also grabs the player reference at the table matching the id and sends it along.
        Parameters:
        id - represenative of the gamestate in the database
        action - the action being performed
        Returns:
        GameUpdateTransport an update for the user to maintain their gamestate

      • bet

        public void bet(GameState gameState,
                GameAction action,
                Player player)
        This method handles bet/raise actions
        Parameters:
        gameState - the state of the game grabbed by repository via ID
        action - the action being performed, interpreted already
        player - the user who performed the action

      • check

        public void check(GameState gameState,
                  GameAction action,
                  Player player)
        check is the method to apply a users check action to the gamestate in question
        Parameters:
        gameState - the current state of the game being played
        action - the action being applied
        player - the player who is performing the action

      • matchmake

        public long matchmake(long playerID)
        This method takes a player's ID and finds a game for them. THe logic for this can be improved as matchmaking algorithms are made more complex.
        Parameters:
        playerID -
        Returns:
